text: This Agreement may not be assigned by either party ---------- without the prior written consent of the other party.
label: Yes

text: Investor will not assign to any Third Party any rights under this IP Agreement not specifically transferable by its terms without the prior written consent of Company, such consent not to be unreasonably withheld.
label: Yes

text: The rights and obligations under this maintenance and support contract may not be assigned in whole or in part by either party without the prior written consent by the other party.
label: Yes

text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time with 30 days written notice.
label: No

text: Upon thirty (30) days prior written notice from a Party (the "Auditing Party"), the other Party (the "Audited Party") shall permit an independent certified public accounting firm of nationally recognized standing selected by the Auditing Party and reasonably acceptable to the Audited Party, to examine, at the Auditing Party's sole expense, the relevant books and records of the Audited Party and its Affiliates as may be reasonably necessary to verify the accuracy of the reports submitted by the Audited Party in accordance with Sections 3.4(d), 4.1(c) and 4.3(a) and the payment of Promotion Fees hereunder.
label: No
